A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Good: Adam driver and Daisy Ridley are excellent as usual\, especially when they are interacting with each other. But it’s as if they are in a different movie than everyone else - which was the movie I came to see. When Laura Dern crashed into another ship. This short scene is a true work of special effects art in its self. The Bad - so many places to start... No mo Poe! Just too much of a dull one dimensional character speaking from a pez dispenser of cliches. Don’t Finn with me! See above and repeat Watching Luke Skywalker get water and fish on an island is like watching someone get water and fish on an island.
